### Overview

SPO-14582: Data Analysis is a seminar offered in the [M.Sc. Sport Science for Health](https://www.sportwissenschaft.uni-konstanz.de/en/study/master-of-science/){.external target="_blank"} at the University of Konstanz. It provides an introduction to data analysis using the statistical programming software R. Students will learn the basics of R programming and how to use R for various common data analysis tasks.
